categories.description: Email containing an invoice, bill, or payment request
Email containing a purchase order or order confirmation
Email containing a contract or agreement document
Any other type of email not related to invoices or orders

options.systemPromptTemplate: You are an expert email classifier for a finance department. Classify emails based on their content and attachments. Focus on identifying invoices, purchase orders, contracts, and payment-related communications.

You are an expert invoice data extractor. Extract all relevant information from the email and attachments. If information is not clearly present, leave it empty. Always try to identify the purchase order number if mentioned.

parameters.subject: =Action Required: Missing Purchase Order - Invoice {{ $('Prepare Invoice (missing PO)').item.json.invoice_number }}
parameters.message:
=

Purchase Order Required

Bonjour,

Nous avons bien recu votre facture mais nous n'avons pas pu identifier le numero de bon de commande associe.

Details de la facture:
Numero: {{ $('Prepare Invoice (missing PO)').item.json.invoice_number }}
Fournisseur: {{ $('Prepare Invoice (missing PO)').item.json.supplier_name }}
Montant: {{ $('Prepare Invoice (missing PO)').item.json.total_amount }} {{ $('Prepare Invoice (missing PO)').item.json.currency }}
Date: {{ $('Prepare Invoice (missing PO)').item.json.invoice_date }}

Action requise: Merci de nous communiquer le numero de bon de commande correspondant a cette facture en repondant a cet email.

Sans ce numero, nous ne pourrons pas proceder au traitement de votre facture.

Cordialement,
Service Comptabilite
